Constructor Detail

AudioHandler

public AudioHandler();
Default Constructor

~AudioHandler

public ~AudioHandler();
Default Destructor

Method Detail

AddSample

public bool AddSample( std::string refName, SAMPLE* sample, bool loop );
Adds an audio sample to the container at the specified key, or updates the audio sample at the key.
Parameters:
refName - The key name for the sample to add. associated with the key.
loop - true if the sample loops when played, false if it doesn't.
Returns:
true if the sample is successfully added, false otherwise.

MapSample

public void MapSample( std::string ref, std::string assetName );
Maps a loaded Audio sample to a reference name to be used by the API.
Parameters:
ref - The string the API will use to reference the sample
assetName - The sample's asset reference name in the Audio handler.

Mute

public void Mute();
Mutes all playing samples and subsequently played samples.

PauseAll

public void PauseAll( bool pause );

PlaySample

public bool PlaySample( std::string refName, int volume_ );
Plays the audio sample at the specified key.
Parameters:
refName - The key name for the sample to play.
volume_ - The volume to play the sample at.
Returns:
true if the sample is successfully started, false otherwise.

RemoveSample

public bool RemoveSample( std::string refName );
Removes the audio sample from the container at the specified key.
Parameters:
refName - The key name for the sample to remove.
Returns:
true if the sample is successfully removed, false otherwise.

ResetLoopFlag

public void ResetLoopFlag( std::string refName, int loop );
Resets the loop flag for the audio sample at the specified key.
Parameters:
refName - The key value for the audio sample.
loop - The new value for the loop flag. Zero for no looping, non-zero for looping.

ResetVolume

public void ResetVolume( int volume_ );
Resets the volume for all currently playing samples.
Parameters:
volume_ - The volume at which to set the samples (0 to 255).

SetVolume

public void SetVolume( int volume );
Sets the volume at which to play all samples.
Parameters:
vol - The volume at which to play audio samples (0 to 100);

StopSample

public void StopSample( std::string refName );
Stops the audio sample at the specified key.
Parameters:
refName - The key name for the sample to stop playing.

Unmute

public void Unmute();
Unmutes all playing samples and subsequently played samples.
